mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO NESTCONTENTS (CONTENTID,CONTENTTITLE,SHORTPOSTER,LONGPOSTER,RELEASEDATE,OVERVIEW,POPULARITY,KIND) VALUES(#{item.contentId},#{item.contentTitle},#{item.shortPoster, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.longPoster, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.releaseDate},#{item.overView}, #{item.popularity},#{item.kind})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
